name: Love Collector
description:
This is my first platform made or played. I had to learn the basics of platform games and emulate them into a new engine i just started to use.

It was great to learn a lot of new things.

I have used my char templates to make them prettier, of course there were tons of features i wanted to implement, but time was not enough for that.

The best thing is i had the chance to make 2 jams and i learned to make short games and still have fun i hope you enjoy it as much as i did making it.

All comentaries are apreciated!
